== Dell Latitude C840 ==

Global Machine Specs: Intel Pentium 4m--2.2/1.2 GHz, 512MB RAM, 15" 1400x1050, GeForce4 440go--32MB dedicated VRAM

=== Maverick Meerkat ===
Installed with live cd, tested from installed OS

==== Remarks ====
* System did not have wifi card installed when purchased.  An Atheros-based card was added later.
* Both removable bays have batteries installed, one can be swapped with a floppy, zip drive or secondary harddrive.
* When suspending, system will go into suspend mode without a problem, but when trying to wake it, the screen stays black, the harddrive indicator is solid, but even after several minutes, it will not awaken from suspend.
* When hibernating, system will
